description: Axiomatic profile compatibility rules for contradiction detection
rule: Profiles must NEVER define compatibility themselves. Compatibility is axiomatic only.

public.description: Public profile is only compatible with itself

enterprise.description: Enterprise profile is compatible with enterprise and legal_strict

legal_strict.description: Legal strict profile is compatible with legal_strict, regulator, and forensics

regulator.description: Regulator profile is compatible with regulator and forensics

forensics.description: Forensics profile is only compatible with itself

enforcement_rules.description: Profiles MUST NOT define compatibility rules. Only this axiom defines compatibility.
Contradiction detection only applies to claims under compatible profiles as defined by this axiom.
